meta_info.name: ACTION
meta_info.description: Used to record a clinical action that has been performed, which may have been ad hoc, or due to the execution of an Activity in an Instruction workflow. Every Action corresponds to a careflow step of some kind or another.

attributes.name: time
attributes.description: Point in time at which this action completed. To indicate an unknown time, use a `DV_DATE_TIME` instance with `_value_` set to the time of creation (or some other known time before which the Action is known to have occurred, e.g. data accession timestamp from integration engine), and `_magnitude_status_` set to `<`.

attributes.name: ism_transition
attributes.description: Details of transition in the Instruction state machine caused by this Action.

attributes.name: instruction_details
attributes.description: Details of the Instruction that caused this Action to be performed, if there was one.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the action that has been performed, in the form of an archetyped structure.
